page.title: 09ANGLING
page.content:
There are two kinds of fishing,sea fishing and freshwater fishing. I prefer freshwater fishing I fish in Loch Scalpay for brown trout. I need a rod 3lb line and a small hook.I use flies for bait if I have any but worms will do.The best catch I,ve caught is a trout 30cm long.
SEA FISHING It is possible to fish of rocks and piers but it is better to have a small boat.you can use a rod or a hand line.The type of fish you are likely to catch are saith,lithe,cod,haddock,mackerel, conger eels and skate.
